text.div:
Cognitive Status Observation: Home Health Start of Care Performance

Did the resident have altered level of consiousness as indicated by any of the following criteria: (1) Vigilant - startles easily to any sound or touch, (2) Lethargic - repeatedly dozed off when being asked questions, but responded to voice or touch, (3) Stuporous - very difficult to arouse and keep aroused for the interview, (4) Comatose - could not be aroused

code.text: Did the resident have altered level of consiousness as indicated by any of the following criteria: (1) Vigilant - startles easily to any sound or touch, (2) Lethargic - repeatedly dozed off when being asked questions, but responded to voice or touch, (3) Stuporous - very difficult to arouse and keep aroused for the interview, (4) Comatose - could not be aroused

valueCodeableConcept.text: Behavior present, fluctuates (comes and goes, changes in severity)
